creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic reproduction of an mythological/religious engraving, featuring three gorgon-like figures and a shawled woman, with text; 12 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink: For Fly, / Thanks for being / your inspiring self! / It was so nice having / you out here. Big hugs! / Lots o\' love, / Weny-O / 3/01
title: Damaged Goods
